#include <iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false), cin.tie(0);
    long long a=1, b=1, in1=1, in2=1;
    while (true) {
        cin>>in1>>in2;
        if (in1==0 && in2==0) break;
        a=in1;
        b=in2;
        if (a<b) swap(a, b);
        int carry=0, total=0;
        while (b!=0) {
            carry+=(a%10+b%10);
            carry/=10;
            if (carry>0) total++;
            a/=10;
            b/=10;
        }
        if (total==0) {
            cout<<"No carry operation.\n";
        } else if (total%10==1) {
            cout<<total<<" carry operation.\n";
        } else {
            cout<<total<<" carry operations.\n";
        }
    }
    cout.flush();
    return 0;
}
